a:s.a:s: /* * Library: IMMZD18SMumpsLogic (IMMZ.D18.S.Mumps schedule) * Schedule Table: 2-dose schedule */ library IMMZD18SMumpsLogic

def.name: First mumps dose from the primary series was administered

a:t.name: complete
a:t.value: First mumps dose from the primary series was administered

a:t.name: pseudocode
a:t.value: "Vaccine type" = "Mumps-containing vaccines" and "Type of dose" = "Primary series") = 1

a:s.a:s: "One mumps primary series dose was administered"

expression.name: One mumps primary series dose was administered

a:s.a:s: "No mumps primary series doses were administered"
"First mumps dose from the primary series was administered"

operand.name: No mumps primary series doses were administered
First mumps dose from the primary series was administered

a:t.name: create
a:t.value: The first dose of the mumps-containing vaccine (monovalent or MMR [measles, mumps and rubella]) should be given at 12–18 months of age.

a:s.a:s: 'The first dose of the mumps-containing vaccine (monovalent or MMR [measles, mumps and rubella]) should be given at 12–18 months of age.'

operand.value: The first dose of the mumps-containing vaccine (monovalent or MMR [measles, mumps and rubella]) should be given at 12–18 months of age.

a:t.name: pseudocode
a:t.value: To be determined by Member States; however, there is no recommended expiration date and individuals are always eligible to be vaccinated.

def.name: Second mumps dose from the primary series was administered. The primary series has been completed

a:t.name: complete
a:t.value: Second mumps dose from the primary series was administered. The primary series has been completed

a:t.name: pseudocode
a:t.value: "Completed the primary vaccination series" = TRUE (where "Vaccine type" = "Mumps-containing vaccines")"

a:s.a:s: "Two mumps primary series doses were administered"

expression.name: Two mumps primary series doses were administered

a:t.name: trigger
a:t.value: First mumps dose from the primary series was administered

a:t.name: pseudo
a:t.value: "Vaccine type" = "Mumps-containing vaccines" and "Type of dose" = "Primary series") = 1

a:t.name: triggerDate
a:t.value: "Date and time of vaccination" (where "Vaccine type" = "Mumps-containing vaccines")

a:s.a:s: "First mumps dose from the primary series was administered"
"Second mumps dose from the primary series was administered. The primary series has been completed"

operand.name: First mumps dose from the primary series was administered
Second mumps dose from the primary series was administered. The primary series has been completed

a:t.name: pseudocode
a:t.value: "Date and time of vaccination" (where "Vaccine type" = "Mumps-containing vaccines") + 1 month

a:t.name: create
a:t.value: The age of administration of the second dose may range from the second year of life to age at school entry (about 6 years of age). The minimum interval between the first and the second doses is 1 month.

a:s.a:s: 'The age of administration of the second dose may range from the second year of life to age at school entry (about 6 years of age). The minimum interval between the first and the second doses is 1 month.'

operand.value: The age of administration of the second dose may range from the second year of life to age at school entry (about 6 years of age). The minimum interval between the first and the second doses is 1 month.

a:t.name: pseudocode
a:t.value: To be determined by Member States; however, there is no recommended expiration date and individuals are always eligible to be vaccinated.

a:t.name: test
a:t.value: Test expected results based on example patients

a:s.a:s: "Second mumps dose from the primary series was administered. The primary series has been completed"
